lead_paragraph: BARUCH--Ralph. On behalf of the Board of Trustees, staff and volunteers of WNET, we are deeply saddened at the passing of esteemed Life Trustee Ralph M. Baruch. Ralph was a visionary pioneer in the broadcasting industry. During his 18 years on the board, he shared his wise counsel and leadership on WNET's Executive and Development Committees, as co-chair of Thirteen's Patron Committee and a chair of WNET's Gala. Our thoughts are with his beloved wife Jean and his entire family - we join them in mourning Ralph, a passionate champion of public media. We will miss him dearly. James S. Tisch, Chairman; Neal Shapiro, President and CEO 1/3
